mapper.insert: insert into tbl_attach(uuid , origin, path, image, odr, bno, mno) values (#{uuid} , #{origin}, #{path}, #{image}, #{odr}, #{bno}, #{mno})
mapper.select: SELECT * from tbl_attach where bno = #{bno} order by odr
select * from tbl_attach ta where path = date_FORMAT(NOW() - INTERVAL 1 DAY, '%Y/%m%/%d');
select concat("/display?uuid=", uuid, "&path=", path) from tbl_attach where mno = #{mno}
